game.name: in the Blue Moonlight
game.categories: Single-player, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: '세계를 뛰어넘어서, 널 만나러 갈게' 조금 특별한 소녀들과 함께하는 동양풍 판타지 연애 어드벤처
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Beyond the World, I'll Go Meet You." An oriental fantasy love adventure with kemonomimi bishoujo
